execution_plan.description: Get IDs of goods whose price is greater than 10.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE price > 10;

execution_plan.description: Get distinct receipt numbers from items that reference the goods found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve receipt details for receipts that either have the earliest date or appear in the list from step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, Date, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE Date = (SELECT MIN(Date) FROM receipts) OR ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);
